sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
gives someone a thrill
, v človeku nenadoma vzbudi napeto pričakovanje ali zadovoljstvo.

seg.quote: The sound of the bell sent a thrill of anticipation through her.
The thrill for me was finding the rare specimens.

sense.def:
To thrill someone
pomeni v nekom povzročiti vznemirjenje.

seg.quote: It's a sight that never fails to thrill me.
